title: (x) VWA Hardcore Wrestling - Serpentine {Mike F}
content:
Hello,

I’m having trouble finding out a font thats on a logo. The closest I can find is the Enter Sandman font but its not quite it. Can anyone find out the font please? Thanks.

[http://www.uwahardcorewrestling.com/phpBB2/templates/graphite/images/header.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127135132/http:/www.uwahardcorewrestling.com/phpBB2/templates/graphite/images/header.gif)
author: renderman

comments.content: To me, it looks like someone used [Serpentine Bold Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127135132/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/serpentine/d-bold-italic/testdrive.html?s=uwa+hardcore+mrestling&p=36), but rotated an m to make a w, cropped an n to make an ugly r and did who knows what to that s. The whole thing was then condensed a bit.
Thanks for the reply. I guess whoever made the logo went to a lot of trouble by editing the font.

Unless, of course, it’s some bad freeware rip-off that has those bad characteristics built into it.

- Lex
